snippet.title: Super Fantasy Kingdom - Official Gameplay Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Rebuild your kingdom and explore a vibrant fantasy world in this roguelite city builder. Defeat hordes of monsters with a unique team of defenders as you harvest, build, mine, cook, brew, and grow. But if your defenses should fail, be prepared to watch it all burn!
Super Fantasy Kingdom will be coming in Q1 2025. Visit Steam and add it to your Wishlist now!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2289750/Super_Fantasy_Kingdom/
